articles.title: European leaders visit Ukraine, dangling hope of EU membership - Reuters
articles.description: The leaders of Germany, France and Italy, all criticised in the past by Kyiv for support viewed as too cautious, visited Ukraine on Thursday and offered the hope of EU membership to a country pleading for weapons to fend off Russia's invasion.
